entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22 with temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22 with temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
